authors.author: George C. Stebbins William T. Sleeper

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: "Ye must be born again; newline Ye must be born again. newline I verily, verily say unto thee, newline Ye must be born again."

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: A ruler once came newline To Jesus by night newline To ask Him the way newline Of salvation and light. newline The Master made answer newline In words true and plain, newline "Ye must be born again."

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Ye children of men, newline Attend to the word newline So solemnly uttered newline By Jesus, the Lord; newline And let not this message newline To you be in vain, newline "Ye must be born again."

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: O ye who would enter newline That glorious rest, newline And sing with the ransomed newline The song of the blest, newline The life everlasting newline If ye would obtain, newline "Ye must be born again."

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: A dear one in heaven newline Thy heart yearns to see, newline At the beautiful gate newline May be watching for thee; newline Then list to the note newline Of this solemn refrain, newline "Ye must be born again."
